Description:
As a very interactive illusion museum in Dubai, we are looking for full time customer service staff. Our aim is to offer our customers a quality of service beyond their expectations.Your role : Follow our visitors along their visit, and help them take pictures with their own smartphones
Propose to them some interesting ideas when posing for the pictures
Show them that you are available at any time, but without being intrusive or over-present
The thin line between available and intrusive is exactly what you will need to master
To entertain kids, and adapt your presentation to their level to make sure they enjoy the experience
Understand and be able to explain every illusion presented in the museum
Ensure resolving queries of customers by providing accurate information within a short timeframe
Collaborate with the manager to stay informed about changes in company rules and projects
To be able to troubleshoot and resolve customer concerns
To be able to make the customer's personal journey as smooth and comfortable as possibleSkills
Skills:
Prior work experience in the face-to-face customer support and service field
Adept in addressing customer questions through effective conversation
Decent photographing skills with a smartphone
Strong communication skills.
Be genuinely caring and patient with children
Fluent English speaking is required
To have a friendly and approachable personality
is a plus : Experience in POS use
is a plus : Experience with cash and card transactions
is a plus : Being fluent in additional languages (any European language, Arabic, Russian, Chinese, Japanese,..)
